fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During day 1 choose to Powertrip. All players who type "=role" and claim it is their role in the day chat become your targets. You must say in chat you are the Comedy Police 4365 for this ability to be valid.
- At night, kill and clean a player. You can choose to delay this ability by any number of nights, causing you to visit them on a later planned night. If you select one of your targets, you must delay the kill by 2 or more nights.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you get less than 3 targets by Powertripping you gain random targets until you have 3.
- You kill roleblockers and clean them.
